title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is experiencing excessive flashing.
OB: There is excessive flashing happening in the Control Example.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, resulting in less flashing.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the Control Example and observe the excessive flashing. The flashing should be reduced to only the bottom edge of the outermost frames.
